Georg Borwin, Duke of Mecklenburg ("Georg Borwin Friedrich Franz Karl Stephan Konrad Hubertus Maria Herzog zu Mecklenburg"; born 10 June 1956) has been the head of the Grand Ducal House of Mecklenburg-Strelitz since 1996. With the extinction of the House of Mecklenburg-Schwerin in 2001 this is the only remaining line of the House of Mecklenburg, the dynasty which ruled in Mecklenburg until 1918.

Early life

Duke Georg Borwin of Mecklenburg was born in Freiburg im Breisgau the youngest child and only son of Duke Georg Alexander of Mecklenburg and his wife Archduchess Ilona of Austria (born 1927). He is a male line descendant of Grand Duke Georg of Mecklenburg-Strelitz and through his mother a descendant of King Frederick Augustus III of Saxony and Emperor Franz Joseph I of Austria.
